nodes.text: A weasel was a creature that was similar to the schutta in Twi'lek culture. The Mostlaa were considered to appear weasel-like. Similarly named creatures included the womp weasel, the bladderweasel, and the scampweasel. The smuggler Karl Ancher once deliberately mispronounced the name of the Imperial Colonel Vessle as "weasel." Dellin Sorth, proprietor of Club Prosperine on Algara II, was considered by some to exhibit smarmy, weasel-like qualities.
